The Song of One Harp was a book written by Storm Silverhand in the .
In it, Storm mused on the nature of life and society in the Realms. Her words, "a lifetime is scarce time enough to find a handful of truth," was a common saying of the Realms. Elminster and Ed of the Greenwood used this passage as a starting point for discussing life in the village of Maskyrs Eye.
There was a copy of the book in Candlekeep by the early 1370s DR.
